title: Web Roulette
description: Web Roulette is a tool that allows you to easily create and share custom roulettes. Create your own original roulette and have fun with friends and family.

about.title: About
about.section1Content: 'Web Roulette' was developed to provide a custom roulette creation tool that anyone can use easily and intuitively. We aim to help you make fair choices while having fun in various situations, from small daily decisions to event lotteries.
about.section2Content: It is intended for a wide range of users, from personal use to business and educational purposes, such as deciding on a lunch spot with friends, drawing penalty games for live streamers, selecting students in the classroom, or choosing winners for online events.
about.section3Content: We sincerely welcome your feedback. We will use it as a reference for future development, so please feel free to contact us via the contact page.
